bibl.title: L'île, regards orientaux. Varia orientalia, biblica et antiqua Hans Hauben in honorem
bibl.note: 1 portrait, nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul.

16 contributions. - Pp. xi-xii: Bruno Cazin, Avant-propos; - xiii-xiv: Didier Devauchelle, Avant-propos; - xv-xxvi: Katelijne Vandorpe, Hans Hauben. Portrait of a Dedicated and Passionate Professor of Ancient History; - xxvii-xxxvii: K.V., Bibliography of Hans Hauben.
bibl.seg: 130 Hauben Hans 160 Hauben Hans 170 Hauben Hans
Christian Cannuyer (ed.), L'île, regards orientaux. Varia orientalia, biblica et antiqua Hans Hauben in honorem = Acta Orientalia Belgica. 26.
Lille, Société belge d'études orientales, 2013, 8°, xxxviii-222 pp., 1 portrait, nombr. figg. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-2-9601012-3-2. €37.

16 contributions. - Pp. xi-xii: Bruno Cazin, Avant-propos; - xiii-xiv: Didier Devauchelle, Avant-propos; - xv-xxvi: Katelijne Vandorpe, Hans Hauben. Portrait of a Dedicated and Passionate Professor of Ancient History; - xxvii-xxxvii: K.V., Bibliography of Hans Hauben.
